Summary: Fireball-like object of an orange/reddish color moving low in the sky outside of home
trends: There have been no other sightings in Woodlyn
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson new years eve i would say around 11:57 my girlfriend noticed outside of our bedroom window an star like object in the north eastern direction,when i went over to see for myself what exactly it was she was looking at. i was only able to view the object in question for around 10 seconds but was able to conclude it was of an orange\reddish color,appeared "closer" than typical stars and was quite bright. i would of continued viewing the object if not for the urges to watch the t.v. to see the ball drop and celebrate new years with my girlfriend although little did i know my uneventful new years evening was about to become a whole lot interesting and the "star" from earlier was not done with us yet. after the new years ball dropped we decided to go outside,walk down the street to the right of my street to watch the fireworks display off in the distance,after about five minutes we decided it was too cold to stay outside and turned around to walk back to my house (it is relevant at this point to mention that when i came outside originally i did look for the star from earlier and could not find it where we had originally spotted it) as soon as we turned around to go back home i immediately spotted an object directly ahead,"floating",slowly moving towards the right.i'd saw the object was about 100-150 yards away distance wise and surprisingly enough was what looked like an orange-ish\red fireball\energy\light spherical shape from what we could tell.it moved at an consistent speed slowly and we jogged towards it in disbelief,shock had just about overcame me for i was actually seeing and experiencing what was an ufo for the first time in my 28 years of life! i was yelling for my girlfriend *(name deleted--cms\sg) to call my mother,call the house! i wanted someone else to see what we were seeing,as fate would have it this enigmatic evening my mother(highly skeptical)just so happened to walk outside of our house at the precise moment we were making our way towards the object(it was right above,in the middle of two parallel telephone poles,no higher than 20 feet for vertical reference,made no sound at all while moving) as the ufo continued to move north eastern away from us i don't know if it picked up speed or not but it eventually faded faster than it was initially moving when we first saw it.i am still amazed at what we saw the other night and i know with 100% certainty what i saw was not conventional aircraft,easily explained away as swamp gas,chinese lanterns,r.c. plane and no...it was not venus!
